    • Method Detail

      • getOrganisms

        public static java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getOrganisms(ObjectStore os,
                                                  InterMineBag bag,
                                                  boolean lowercase)
        For a bag of objects, returns a list of organisms
        Parameters:
        os - ObjectStore
        lowercase - if true, the organism names will be returned in lowercase
        bag - InterMineBag
        Returns:
        collection of organism names

      • getOrganisms

        public static java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getOrganisms(ObjectStore os,
                                                  InterMineBag bag,
                                                  boolean lowercase,
                                                  java.lang.String organismFieldName)
        For a bag of objects, returns a list of organisms.
        Parameters:
        os - ObjectStore
        lowercase - if true, the organism names will be returned in lowercase
        bag - InterMineBag
        organismFieldName - eg. name, shortName or taxonId
        Returns:
        collection of organism names

      • getChromosomes

        public static java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getChromosomes(ObjectStore os,
                                                    java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> organisms,
                                                    boolean lowercase)
        Return a list of chromosomes for specified organism
        Parameters:
        os - ObjectStore
        organisms - Organism names. Assumes they are lowercase.
        lowercase - if true returns lowercase chromosome names. the precomputed tables indexes are all lowercase, so the chromosome names need to be lowercase when used in queries
        Returns:
        collection of chromosome names

      • getExtraAttributes

        public static java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getExtraAttributes(ObjectStore os,
                                                        InterMineBag bag)
        Get the extra attributes needed for the DataSetLoader
        Parameters:
        os - the objectstore
        bag - the bag
        Returns:
        a collection of strings to pass to the datasetloader

      • replaceStrain

        public static java.lang.Integer replaceStrain(java.lang.Integer taxonId)
        Looks in the organism repo for the taxon ID provided. If the taxon ID is not there, it looks for strains that use that ID. Will return NULL if there is no strain and no taxon ID in the organism data.
        Parameters:
        taxonId - original taxon ID
        Returns:
        taxonId for organism, not the strain

      • getStrain

        public static java.lang.String getStrain(java.lang.String taxonId)
        Returns strains for given taxon Id
        Parameters:
        taxonId - original taxon ID
        Returns:
        taxonId for strain or original taxon if no strain exists

      • getStrain

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getStrain(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> taxonIdSet)
        Returns strains for given collection of taxon Ids
        Parameters:
        taxonIdCol - a collection of original taxon ID
        Returns:
        strainMap for strain or original taxon if no strain exists in a map (key:strain, value:original taxon)
